datas.product: Arc Audio MPAK-14CX Motorcycle Coaxial Speaker Kit - Fits 2014+ HD Street Glide and Road Glide Motorcycles

about_this_item: Designed And Tested By Factory Trained Technicians At Mitchell's Modesto Harley Davidson.
MPAK Kits Are Designed To Bolt Into Your HD Motorcycle's Factory Locations In The Front Fairing.
No Loss Of Space In Your Side Bags Or Touring Pack.
High Efficiency Non-Digital Amplifier Design Works Within The Parameters Of The Factory Motorcycle Charging System.
Speakers Bolt Directly Into The Factory Locations With No Modifications Or Changes Needed To The Factory Speakers Mounting Area.
details.product_descriptions: This MPAK kit includes the following products: MOTO720.4 Amplifier, a pair of MOTO602V2 Coaxial Speakers, a HD-FH2014 Wiring Harness Kit, and a RG15 Amplifier Mounting Kit As the MPAK14 is a full kit, it includes speakers that bolt into the factory location and work with the enclosures in the fairing. Likewise, the kit includes dedicated power wiring to ensure efficient current delivery to the amp. Finally, the signal wiring uses OEM-compatible connectors to extract a signal from the factory radio and feed it to the DSP or MOTO720 amp. Not a single wire needs to be cut, tapped, or modified in any way, so your warranty remains unquestionably intact while you can enjoy your music the way it was supposed to be enjoyed  loud! Designed for use with 2014 and up Harley Davidson Street Glide and Road Glide Motorcycles Includes all components necessary for both Street Glide and Road Glide Applications Motorcycles that already have Boom II/III kits may require additional components, parts and/or labor to complete the installation properly Designed and tested by factory trained technicians at Mitchell's Modesto Harley Davidson. MPAK kits are designed to fit directly into your HD Motorcycle's factory locations in the front fairing. No loss of space inside your side bags of tour pack. High-Efficiency Non-Digital amplifier design works within the parameters of the factory motorcycle charging system. Speakers bolt directly into the factory locations with no modifications or changes needed to the factory speakers mounting area. Allows you to upgrade your HD audio system and still retain all factory handle bar stereo controls. Wire harness and installation kit contents selected by Mitchell's Modesto Harley Davidson technicians so that the stereo will not void the motorcycles factory electrical warranty. (At No Point In This Installation Does The Motorcycles Main Harness Need To Be Cut!) Includes full plug and play input/output signal wire harness.

datas.product: MB Quart MBQX-STG5-1 X3 Radio, Speakers, Rear Cans, Sub, Amps,Black

about_this_item: Features of MBQX-STG5-1: Compatible vehicle fitment: Can-Am Maverick X3 2017 and newer, Marine grade protection/ipx rating: IPX67, Source unit features: QUICK PAIR immediately connects to the last device that was connected and you'll have full Apple Control with Bluetooth capabilities. This unit also displays Album Artwork, if present, in your file. High voltage output guarantees maximum volume when running external amplifiers.

Speaker features: The front speakers are meticulously engineered to fit in the X3 dash. They include a 1' Titanium Dome Tweeter that will deliver natural sounding high frequency response, while producing high volume. Injection molded composition Polypropylene cone produces impactful bass with minimal cone flex. The Composite (UV Resistant ASA+Fiberglass) frames are incredibly strong and lightweight.

The entire assembly earns an IPX68 rating which makes it as indestructible as the X3. The rear (Pod) speakers are the exact speaker as the front but mounted in a pair of versatile shallow mount enclosure with the included swivel mounts for perfect alignment to the listener regardless of the roll cage angle. Amplifier features: The Can Am system is powered by the NA2 series of amplifiers. The stereo amplifier is operating in 2 ohm mode for maximum volume for all 4 speakers (front and rear pods).

Subwoofer features: 400 Watt SUB STAGE Specific 10 inch Underseat Subwoofer System includes 10 inch, Dual 4 ohm Subwoofer, Maverick X3 Specific Under-Seat Subwoofer Enclosure, and 400 Watt Class D, Mount/harness: Plug and Play Harness. Waterproof Connectors with premeasured wires. No guess work, no installation mistakes., Time and tools: Standard hand tools are required. See the manual for time on each of the different components.

Specifications of NA2-400.2: Class: Full Range Class D, Variable Voltage: 0.2V~9V, Signal to Noise Ratio: >90dB, Frequency Response: 20Hz-20kHz, Crossover Type: Electronic 12dB Per Octave, Low Pass Crossover: Switch Low Pass 300 Hz, Bass Boost: 0-12dB@45Hz, Subsonic Filter: 60Hz, Power @ 2-Ohms: 2 x 200W, Power @ 4-Ohms: 2 x 100W, Total Channels: 2, Audio Inputs: RCA, Power Terminal 12v/GND: Molex 10 ga, Speaker Terminal Wire Gauge: Molex Plug Connector, Fusing: 1 x 30 Amps.
warranty_and_Support: https://www.amazon.comAmazon.com Return Policy  Amazon.com Voluntary 30-Day Return Guarantee: You can return many items you have purchased within 30 days following delivery of the item to you. Our Voluntary 30-Day Return Guarantee does not affect your legal right of withdrawal in any way. You can find out more about the exceptions and conditions here.

Item details.Included Components: MBQX-STG5-1 800 Watt STAGE 5 Can-Am X3 Tuned System

Usage.Recommended Uses For Product: For Smartphones or Tablets, Tablets interessieren

details.product_descriptions: Awesome sound for the great outdoors Can-Am's Maverick X3 is a high-performance side-by-side with plenty of power, and MB Quart's Stage 5 kit is the ultimate Maverick system. With a marine digital media receiver, front and rear 6-1/2' marine speakers, a 4-channel amp, a mono sub amp, and a 10' subwoofer, this system will add some serious thump to your off-road adventures. MB Quart designed this package to fit right into your Maverick, with no cutting and minimal hassle. It also comes with all the parts and pieces needed for a smooth, hassle-free installation. Each component is tough enough for trail duty, so you won't have to worry about your system getting swamped. A rugged receiver that fits right in The MB Quart MBQX-RAD-1 digital media receiver packs a lot of cool stuff into a compact, outdoor-ready package that's made for your Maverick. This AM/FM/WB receiver features built-in Bluetooth, so you can pair up quickly and stream music stored on your phone. If you prefer to plug in, you'll find an AUX input and a charging USB input. If you want to expand your system later, the GMR-LED features a full set of preamp outputs, along with a handy camera input. This kit includes a custom-designed dash panel that holds the receiver and blends into your Maverick's dash. Dash speakers designed for your ride The package includes a pair of NP1-116 Nautic marine speakers that are built for off-road and marine use. The durable poly cones withstand moisture and sunlight, as do the 1' titanium dome tweeters. They're really easy to install, too, thanks to the made-for-the-Maverick X3 speaker enclosures included in this kit. These rugged enclosures bolt right in using the factory mounting holes with just a little bit of drilling. The left speaker panel works with your Maverick's Smart-Lok(tm). Crank it up with cage-mount speakers Out back, you'll have another pair of NP1-116 speakers in cage-mount pods designed for your Maverick.

details.product_descriptions: Humminbird 411250-1 MEGA 360 Imaging UltrexThe MEGA 360 Imaging - Ultrex transducer provides a 360-degree, detail-rich view around your boat. Designed to mount to the Minn Kota Ultrex, this transducer provides uninterrupted use of your Ultrex motor while using MEGA 360 Imaging, even while in Spot-Lock. So keep fishing in wind, waves and nasty weather, and we'll still deliver the MEGA Imaging all around you for versatility in your fishing.Minn Kota 1852088 MKR-MI-1 Humminbird Helix 8, 9, 10 and 12 MEGA Imaging Adapter Cable, 30 inchMEGA Imaging uses high-frequency sonar so you can easily distinguish fish from structure, see the direction fish are facing and even target individual species. datas.product: Victron Energy MultiPlus-II 120V, 3000VA 12-Volt Pure Sine Wave Inverter and 120 amp Battery Charger

about_this_item: Victron Energy MultiPlus-II is a multifunctional inverter/charger with all the features of the Victron Energy MultiPlus and the MultiGrid

It has all the features of the Victron Energy MultiPlus, plus an external current transformer option to implement PowerControl and PowerAssist and to optimize self-consumption with external current sensing (max 32A)
It also has all the features of the Victron Energy MultiGrid with built-in anti-islanding
When coupled with a Victron Energy GX device (Sold separately) you can monitor and control your Victron Energy MultiPlus-II and system remotely via the internet from anywhere in the world
Incorrect installation can be hazardous, Please consult a licensed professional and follow all applicable electrical codes during installation
